attributes.action: Tax Relief for Government Outlined Key Workers during Covid-19 Pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Key Workers are keeping the country going and providing amazing support to each other in communities across the country. I believe they should be rewarded with Tax Relief.
attributes.background:
Tax relief for key workers that have been outlined by the Government

Health & Social Care 
Education & Childcare
Key Public Services
Local & National Government
Food and other necessary goods
Public Safety and National Security
Transport 
Utilities, Communication and financial services

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
